title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, cannot open in another editor (should give error msg)
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, cannot open in another editor (should give error msg)
OB: When attempting to open a file that is already opened in one editor, there is no warning or error message displayed.
EB: However, there should be a warning or error message indicating that the file is already opened in an editor and cannot be opened in another editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a file in one editor.
2. Attempt to open the same file in another editor.
3. Observe that there is no warning or error message displayed.
